cation/SP1VerificationGateway.sol":{"keccak256":"0x99f0e9b3a335eb7750207a9649d610a9f14d195b099cce4951b6d4c3dd3327d7","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://a3d8f0efb5a3623fb3d4ff2466b96f11d36b1ef8fd7636c96a98005e25e705fd","dweb:/ipfs/QmUwNHDG51Kt7ph6BULsN6J7GpAd6bPG4GA5wyR4v46jFp"]},"src/verification/VerificationGateway.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf58cfad3d03ba3b9ff9fa550574b9c83bcec1f76ea514dce6f7b369e29f92d9c","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://e9f9c75db0a6cc2113e3b1b00a1d654ebaadc071ff2428b0a53181fdce5278e2","dweb:/ipfs/QmPidKa8dkoozmAVq6VrRaHAgya1s2UAr7bDjL1gFBwcuG"]}},"version":1}

addRegistry(uint64,bytes32,bytes32).details: Only the sender can add a VK for their own address

params.registry: The registry ID to associate with the verification key

params._coprocessorRoot: The root hash of the coprocessor

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

removeRegistry(uint64).details: Only the sender can remove a VK for their own address

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateVerifier(address).details: Only the owner can update the verifier address

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

params.domainMessage: The domain message associated with the domain proof
params.message: The message associated with the proof

addRegistry(uint64,bytes32,bytes32).notice: Adds a verification key for a specific registry ID

coprocessorRoot().notice: Root hash of the ZK coprocessor

getVerifier().notice: Returns the verifier cast to the ISP1Verifier interface

initialize(bytes32,address).notice: Initializes the verification gateway replcaing the constructor with a coprocessor root and verifier address

programVKs(address,uint64).notice: Mapping of program verification keys by user address and registry ID

removeRegistry(uint64).notice: Removes a verification key for a specific registry ID

verifier().notice: Generic verifier address that will be specialized in derived contracts

verify(uint64,bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes).notice: Verifies a proof using the SP1 verifier
